title: Elegant Polki Paired Pendant Necklace - A Contemporary Classic
features: This elegant necklace features two pear-shaped pendants, each adorned with a captivating Polki diamond at its heart. The Polki diamonds are framed by a delicate halo of brilliant-cut diamonds, adding sparkle and enhancing their natural beauty. The minimalist gold chain allows the pendants to be the focal point, creating a sophisticated and timeless piece.
colors: Warm yellow gold contrasts beautifully with the icy white Polki diamonds and the dazzling brilliance of the surrounding cut diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday elegance or special occasions like cocktail parties
or any event where you want to add a touch of understated luxury. A modern twist on traditional Addigai
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional Polki craftsmanship with a contemporary design. The use of high-quality materials ensures durability and lasting value. The unique pear-shaped pendant design offers a subtle yet striking statement. The Polki diamonds, with their natural imperfections, add character and a sense of history to the piece.
